headline: S&P 500's Palantir Leads Five Stocks To Watch Amid Trade War
summary: S&P 500 component Palantir and four other stocks near buy points are worth adding to watchlists as a trade war weighs on the market.

headline: Stock-Split Watch: Is Palantir Technologies Next?
summary: Many businesses saw their share prices collapse in early 2025.  Palantir stock has risen by nearly 30% this year, with analysts very bullish on the company's prospects for both 2025 and 2026.  With Palantir's stock price hovering around the $100 mark for the second time in its history, could a stock split be in store this year?
